author: stefan2
msg: Fix / silence some integer conversion warnings.
(packed_stream_read): We know those are well within apr_size_t's
(auto_open_l2p_index): The config reader limits the BLOCK_SIZE
(get_l2p_header_body): Use the appropriate type for the iteration
Cast revnum count after we verified its range
(prefetch_l2p_pages): Exit early for non-positive ranges and use

author: stefan2
msg: Some of our FSFS config settings will cause malfunction if invalid
values were given.  Thus, sanitize them before using them.
(sanitize_block_size): New function to verify config data.
(read_config): Use the new function to guarantee valid settings

author: pkluegl
msg: - integrated contributed project in ruta-core-ext and ruta-ep-core-ext
